item.title: 韩国采取行动遏制住宅市场投机行为的上升势头
item.description: 韩国代总统崔相木誓言采取 "一切可行的措施"，防止房地产市场出现狂热，因为这种狂热有可能使决策者支撑经济的努力复杂化。【原文：South Korea plans fresh curbs on housing transactions in Seoul as Acting President Choi Sang-mok vowed to take “all available steps” to prevent a frenzy in the property market that could potentially complicate efforts by policymakers to shore up the economy.】

item.title: 通过退出美股重塑世界
item.description:
除了纠正价格之外，还有更重要的事情正在发生。【原文：

Something much bigger is going on than simply correcting prices.

】

item.title: 巴黎达到顶峰？全球银行搁置法国招聘计划
item.description:
税率上升、交易放缓和政治动荡正在影响法国首都成为欧洲卓越金融中心的雄心壮志。【原文：

Rising taxes, slowing deals, and political volatility are weighing on the French capital’s ambitions to become Europe’s preeminent financial center.

】

item.title: 企业预计特朗普放松管制将给欧洲带来更多痛苦
item.description: 据一个重要游说团体进行的调查显示，大多数欧洲企业预计，唐纳德-特朗普总统全面推动放松管制的政策将使投资从落后的欧盟转向其他国家。【原文：Most European businesses expect President Donald Trump’s sweeping push for deregulation to divert investments away from a lagging European Union, according to a survey conducted by a key lobby group.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利结束对 SK 海力士股票有争议的卖出交易
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）分析师将 SK Hynix Inc. 的评级从 "减持 "上调至 "等权重"，称他们去年 9 月下调该公司评级的时机不对，因为该公司因看好其供应尖端存储芯片的前景而股价大涨。【原文：Morgan Stanley analysts upgraded SK Hynix Inc. to equal-weight form underweight, saying they mistimed their downgrade last September as the stock has since rallied on optimism about the company’s prospects in supplying cutting-edge memory chips.】

item.title: 土耳其警方拘留埃尔多安的竞争对手埃克雷姆-伊马莫格鲁
item.description: 据 CNNTurk 报道，伊斯坦布尔市长埃克雷姆-伊马莫格鲁周三上午在家中被拘留，一天前土耳其当局吊销了他的大学文凭。此举可能阻碍他在下届总统选举中挑战雷杰普-塔伊普-埃尔多安。【原文：Istanbul’s mayor, Ekrem Imamoglu, was detained at his home Wednesday morning, according to CNNTurk, a day after Turkish authorities revoked his university diploma. It’s a move that could bar him from challenging Recep Tayyip Erdogan in the next presidential election.】

item.title: 野村认为泰国将进一步降息，泰国 BOT 将重点转向增长
item.description: 野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc）预测，泰国央行将采取更积极的降息措施来支持经济。【原文：The Bank of Thailand’s rate-setting panel has shifted its focus toward the country’s weakening growth outlook, with Nomura Holdings Inc. predicting more aggressive rate cuts to support the economy.】

item.title: 小米计划扩建北京电动车工厂以满足激增的需求
item.description: 据一位熟知内情的人士透露，小米公司正在扩大其计划在北京建立的第二家电动汽车工厂的规模，此前其首款车型的成功促使亿万富翁、联合创始人雷军将今年的销售目标提高到 35 万辆。【原文：Xiaomi Corp. is expanding the size of a planned second electric car factory in Beijing, according to a person familiar with the matter, after the success of its first model prompted billionaire co-founder Lei Jun to raise this year’s sales target to 350,000 vehicles.】

item.title: 特朗普将批准 Venture Global 的 CP2 项目出口液化天然气
item.description: 特朗普政府准备有条件地批准 Venture Global LNG 公司从路易斯安那州的一个计划设施出口天然气。【原文：The Trump administration is prepared to give Venture Global LNG Inc. conditional approval to export natural gas from a planned facility in Louisiana that had stalled under former President Joe Biden.】

item.title: 2024 年极端天气迫使 16 年来最多的人逃离家园
item.description: 据一份报告称，去年包括台风、热浪和洪水在内的极端天气导致了自2008年以来最大规模的人口流离失所，并加剧了十多个国家的粮食危机。【原文：Extreme weather last year including typhoons, heatwaves and flooding led to the biggest displacement of people since 2008, and exacerbated a food crisis in more than a dozen countries, according to a report.】

item.title: 签约 NBA 球星后，安踏体育 2024 年销售额超预期
item.description: 安踏体育用品有限公司 2024 年的销售额好于预期，这一年，这家中国最大的体育用品制造商与 NBA 球星凯里-欧文（Kyrie Irving）签订了代言协议，赢得了海外市场的关注。【原文：Anta Sports Products Ltd. reported better-than-expected sales in 2024, a year that saw China’s biggest sportswear maker gain eyeballs overseas after signing an endorsement deal with NBA star Kyrie Irving.】

item.title: 关税威胁促使台积电的台湾同行寻求在美国扩张
item.description: 今年 3 月，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和台湾中芯国际集成电路制造股份有限公司董事长魏幸全走进罗斯福厅，揭开了美国历史上最大的外商投资之一的序幕：1000 亿美元的赌注，让高端芯片再次在美国制造。对于特朗普来说，这是他上任第 43 天值得回味的时刻。而对于远在 8000 英里之外的李泽楷来说，这是一个行动的号召。【原文：In March, President Donald Trump and Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.’s C. C. Wei walked into the Roosevelt Room to unveil one of the largest foreign investments in US history: a $100 billion bet that high-end chips can be made, once again, in the US. For Trump, it was a moment to savor on the 43rd day back in office. For Richard Lee, watching almost 8,000 miles away, it was a call to action.】

item.title: 策略师称日元可能因日本央行标榜全球不确定性而走软
item.description: 策略师称，日本央行周三维持政策利率不变，强调了美国贸易政策带来的风险，日元可能将迎来一段疲软期。【原文：The yen may be set for a period of softness after the Bank of Japan highlighted risks from US trade policies as it kept its policy rate on hold Wednesday, strategists say.】

item.title: 财政部长称降息有助于菲律宾实现 7% 的增长率
item.description: 菲律宾财政部长拉尔夫-雷克托（Ralph Recto）表示，降息将为投资和消费提供支持，菲律宾经济今年的增长率可高达7%。【原文：The Philippine economy can grow as much as 7% this year, aided by interest-rate cuts that will support investment and consumption, according to Finance Secretary Ralph Recto who also brushed aside concerns over political stability.】

item.title: 印尼监管机构在市场疲软后放宽股票回购规定
item.description: 印尼证券监管机构周三表示，将允许公司在未经股东大会批准的情况下回购股票，此举可能会缓解本周股市惨遭抛售后的紧张情绪。【原文：Indonesia’s securities regulator said Wednesday it will allow companies to buy back stock without approval from a shareholder meeting, a move that could ease nerves following a painful selloff this week.】

item.title: 美银美林警告中国股市 "很快 "将在2015年重演
item.description: 美银美林证券公司（BofA Securities）的策略师表示，鉴于中国股市的涨势与 2015 年的繁荣与萧条周期相似，中国股市可能很快就会面临 "有意义的修正"。【原文：China’s stock rally may face a “meaningful correction soon” given its similarities with the 2015 boom and bust cycle, according to strategists at BofA securities.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚财政部长辞职，证实了投资者的担忧
item.description: 哥伦比亚财政部长迭戈-格瓦拉（Diego Guevara）证实了早些时候的新闻报道，即他将在上任仅三个月后提交辞呈。【原文：Colombian Finance Minister Diego Guevara confirmed earlier news reports that he was submitting his resignation after only three months in office, a move that had sent the country’s assets tumbling on Tuesday.】

item.title: 日本央行维持利率不变后日元兑美元小幅走低
item.description: 日本央行在结束世界上最后一次负利率一年内三次上调政策利率后，一如预期保持了政策利率的稳定，日元兑美元汇率小幅走低。【原文：The yen traded slightly weaker against the dollar after the Bank of Japan kept its policy interest rate steady as expected after three hikes in the year since it ended the world’s last negative interest rate.】

item.title: 印度计划征收 12% 的钢铁关税以防止 "永久性损害
item.description: 世界第二大钢铁生产国印度正计划对大部分进口金属征收 12% 的关税，这是一系列寻求保护本国工业的国家中最新的一个。【原文：India, the world’s second-biggest steel producer, is planning to impose duties of 12% on most imports of the metal, the latest in a string of nations to seek protection for their domestic industries.】

item.title: 作物短缺使印度食糖库存陷入困境
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts, we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 日本央行保持利率稳定，官员关注全球风险上升
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫考虑了 1 月份加息的影响，并对全球经济风险保持警惕，因此维持关键政策利率不变。【原文：The Bank of Japan kept its key policy rate unchanged, as Governor Kazuo Ueda mulled the impact from January’s hike and remained wary of risks in the global economy.】

item.title: 贝恩资本旗下桥梁数据公司获得创纪录的 28 亿美元贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，贝恩资本（Bain Capital）旗下的数据中心运营商 Bridge Data Centres 为其在马来西亚的业务获得了 28 亿美元的贷款，这是该公司有史以来最大的一笔银行融资交易。【原文：Bain Capital-owned data center operator Bridge Data Centres has obtained a $2.8 billion loan for its operations in Malaysia, according to people familiar with the matter, marking the its largest bank financing deal ever.】

item.title: 印尼公司债券利差在动荡中触及六个月高位
item.description: 随着信贷交易商消化股市暴跌带来的影响，印尼公司的美元债券利差已达到六个月来最宽的水平。【原文：Indonesian companies’ dollar bond spreads have hit their widest level in six months as credit traders digest the ramifications of a brutal stock market selloff.】

item.title: 中国玉米进口放缓，前景堪忧
item.description: 中国的玉米进口速度是七个季度以来最慢的，这表明即使缩减年度采购量的预测也可能难以实现。【原文：Chinese corn imports are running at their slowest pace in seven seasons, suggesting that even scaled back forecasts for annual purchases may prove hard to reach.】

item.title: CSOP 将在香港推出杠杆及反向单一股票 ETF
item.description: CSOP Asset Management Ltd 将推出香港首批追踪海外单一股票的杠杆和反向交易所交易基金产品，以吸引风险偏好较高的本地散户投资者。【原文：CSOP Asset Management Ltd will launch Hong Kong’s first batch of leveraged and inverse exchange-traded fund products tracking single stocks overseas in a bid to tap local retail investors with riskier appetites.】

item.title: 普京在会谈中拒绝乌克兰停火，但特朗普称这是一场胜利
item.description: 弗拉基米尔-普京总统拒绝了唐纳德-特朗普和他的团队提出的在乌克兰实现 30 天停火的要求，而这正是结束长达三年冲突的必经之路。但这对美国总统来说已经足够了。【原文：President Vladimir Putin refused to give Donald Trump the 30-day ceasefire in Ukraine he and his team had demanded on the path toward ending the three-year conflict. It was still good enough for the US president.】

item.title: 交易员权衡美联储动向和风险厌恶情绪，黄金维持在历史纪录附近
item.description: 在美联储做出利率决定之前，黄金保持在创纪录水平附近，华尔街大跌后的风险厌恶情绪为贵金属提供了支撑。【原文：Gold held near a record ahead of an interest-rate decision from the Federal Reserve, with the precious metal supported by risk-off sentiment following a selloff on Wall Street.】

item.title: 铁矿石运输车坠毁后矿产资源公司股价暴跌 13
item.description: 澳大利亚矿业公司矿产资源有限公司（Mineral Resources Ltd.）暂停从其昂斯洛铁矿项目沿通往港口的主干道运输铁矿石后，股价暴跌达 13%。【原文：Shares in Australian miner Mineral Resources Ltd. slumped by as much as 13% after the company suspended haulage of iron ore from its Onslow Iron project along the main road to port.】

item.title: 爱尔兰中央银行因贸易风险下调经济预测
item.description: 爱尔兰中央银行下调了经济展望，理由是地缘政治不确定性空前上升，可能会对爱尔兰产生巨大影响。【原文：The Irish Central Bank has revised down its outlook for the economy, citing an unprecedented rise in geopolitical uncertainty that could have an outsized impact on Ireland.】

item.title: 英国 "拉平 "计划岌岌可危，不平等将进一步扩大
item.description: 一项新的分析显示，未来三年内，英国大部分地区将进一步落后于伦敦，这凸显了工党政府在提高全国生活水平方面所面临的挑战。【原文：Most UK regions are set to fall further behind London over the next three years, according to a new analysis, highlighting the Labour government’s challenge to improve living standards across the country.】
